item.description:
Worcester Movie Fans,

I'm sorry I haven't scheduled a movie meetup for a while. September was a busy month for me. I'm back in town and willing to meetup for some movies again! I checked the West Boylston Cinema and they're showing a new independent film this week: Winter's Bone.

The movie is playing at 7:15 PM Thursday, October 7. Let's meet in the lobby at the West Boylston Cinema at 7:00. Anyone who wants to can join me for food, drink, and conversation after the film.

Summary: WINNER -- Best Picture AND Best Screenplay at the Sundance Film Festival! 17 year-old Ree Dolly (Jennifer Lawrence) sets out to track down her father, who put their house up for his bail bond and then disappeared. If she fails, Ree and her family will be turned out into the Ozark woods. Challenging her outlaw kin's code of silence and risking her life, Ree hacks through the lies, evasions and threats offered up by her relatives and begins to piece together the truth.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Winter's Bone - Sundance Film Festival Best Picture
